context: Aerospace company considering expansion into commercial space tourism operations

request.purpose: Develop and launch commercial space tourism service using existing suborbital technology
request.justification: Capitalize on growing space tourism market and diversify revenue streams beyond government contracts

decision_process.outcome: Identified $5B market opportunity with 20% annual growth
Feasible with existing technology platform, additional safety certifications required
15% IRR projected over 10 years with break-even in year 5
Strategic partnerships secured with major insurance and tourism companies

business_impact.expected_outcome: New revenue stream established, brand enhancement in commercial space sector

lessons_learned: Space tourism requires extensive safety protocols and insurance partnerships beyond traditional aerospace operations
